title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Best practices to simplify resilience at scale for Gen AI data & apps (STG317)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 简化生成式AI数据和应用程序大规模弹性的最佳实践 (STG317)
abstract: Learn how modern data protection platforms like Clumio provide automated safeguards for cloud-native applications and data lakes, helping to enable business continuity and the rapid recovery capabilities essential for AI. This presentation is brought to you by Commvault, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 了解像 Clumio 这样的现代数据保护平台如何为云原生应用程序和数据湖提供自动化保护措施，帮助实现业务连续性以及对 AI 至关重要的快速恢复能力。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Commvault 提供。
